mapper.select: select (select curr_date from ttrd_currdate) as 创建日期, i.i_name as 机构名称, tr_type.description as 业务种类, tr.ord_id as 审批单号, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, tr.orddate as 交易日期, tr.operator as 经办人, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度, tr.bnd_settype as 结算方式, right.u_i_code as 标的债券代码, bb.b_name as 标的债券名称, right.currency as 币种, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount /10000 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount /10000 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 票面金额, right.fst_setdate as 首期结算日期, right.end_setdate as 到期结算日期, right.repo_trade_variety as 交易品种, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.rate*100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 回购利率, case when INSTR(instrument.term,'D') > 0 then REPLACE(instrument.term,'D','') else instrument.term end as 回购期限, TRIM(to_char(cast(e.fst_set_amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 首期结算金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(e.fst_set_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 首期总应计利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(e.end_set_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 到期总应计利息, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.fst_netprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 首期净价, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.end_netprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 到期净价, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.fst_fullprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 首期全价, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.end_fullprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 到期全价, TRIM(to_char(cast(e.end_set_amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 到期结算金额 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join ttrd_outright right on tr.i_code = right.i_code left join ttrd_otc_trade_extend e on tr.sysordid = e.trd_id left join ttrd_instrument instrument on tr.i_code = instrument.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type LEFT JOIN TBND bb on right.u_i_code = bb.i_code and right.u_m_type = bb.m_type and right.u_a_type = bb.a_type left join tinstrument_inst_grade inst_grade on tr.i_code = bb.i_code and tr.m_type = bb.m_type and tr.a_type = bb.a_type LEFT JOIN tinstrument_comp_grade com_grade on i.i_id = com_grade.comp_id where tr.ord_id = (select distinct trr.ord_id FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE trr where trr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId}) and tr.ref_sysordid is null and tr.ordstatus<0
